game_description: Life is hard, it can be annoying and there can be a lot of STRESS. SMASHY SMASHY VR is a stress release app that allows users to SMASH and DESTROY VR environments. Choose from familiar environments such as the Office work place and the Local Supermarket or choose alternative environments like a giant game of chess or Egypt! NEW CONTENT: * New Maps "Halloween Village" and "Christmas Town" * Time Attack mode * Unlockable mods for Free Mode No need to Smash your expensive TV, Smash TV's in VR and don't worry about the mess! Smashy Smashy VR is still in its early development and has future game modes and environments in production. So if there are items or places you want to see in future feel free to leave feedback! Enjoy SMASHING in Smashy Smashy VR!
review_1: My wife kelly placed a restraining order against me after the divorce and took the kids and the house, at first my way of reliving my stress was drinking and driving, but then i headed to my local beat buy and picked up that oculus i heard about on tictok, now i am jobless and i live in this virtual world proving that i do not need a family to be happy and enjoy life
review_2: Man I love to get mad at fortnite and smash my computer man I got to hate it when that banana comes in and starts taking the L on me and shoots me with the double pump like what did I do to you Mr banana so then I throw my chair at my monitor and Mr banana man got shot by my teammate so I guess I wasted my monitor but oh well.
review_3: My brother, hughjass n. Bals played the game for 24 hrs. And ended up killing me by smashing the controller into me. Not funny as I'm dead.
review_4: My son Finnigan Von Dickinsworth has been playing the game non-stop. I tried to get him to stop, but he doesn’t understand proper English anymore. Of course, I put him up for adoption, but he plays still. Curious, I purchased the game, and found utter disappointment and dissatisfaction throughout my experience, undoubtedly because of the games lack of morals. It continuously harassed my pure strength, critiquing my posture and form, until I gave up and left the game to rot. My experience was terrible, with no smashing to be done. I’m in tears, disappointed at the time wasted here, crying.
review_5: The game is still getting updated but it is still good to play it helps for stress and social anxiety I would recommend this game for all ages
